Literature.Title: Synergistic activity of the tyrocidines, antimicrobial cyclodecapeptides from Bacillus aneurinolyticus, with amphotericin B and caspofungin against Candida albicans biofilms.
Literature.Author: Troskie AM, Rautenbach M, Delattin N, Vosloo JA, Dathe M, Cammue BP, Thevissen K

Literature.Title: Antifungal membranolytic activity of the tyrocidines against filamentous plant fungi.
Literature.Author: Rautenbach M, Troskie AM, Vosloo JA, Dathe ME

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans SC5314(MIC=12.5±0.00µM),Candida albicans SC5314(MIC50=7.93±0.48µM),Botrytis cinerea CKJ 1731(IC50=3.2±0.2µM),Fusarium solani STEU 6188(IC50=5.2±0.8µM),Aspergillus fumigatus ATCC 204305(IC50=3.8±0.3µM)
